li.label: has ranged weapon
li.description: I am ready for the next fight.

li.label: strong one in minor pain
li.description: It's okay.

li.label: strong one in serious pain
li.description: I can hold it.

li.label: strong one in intense pain
li.description: How can I fall like that!

li.label: strong one in mind-shattering pain
li.description: I hope I have done some…

li.label: believer in minor pain
li.description: It's easy compared to overtime.

li.label: believer in serious pain
li.description: I must be strong! Trust the chairman!

li.label: believer in intense pain
li.description: Don't give up! The chairman said that everyone can survive!

li.label: believer in mind-shattering pain
li.description: Even if I die...lay in a grave...I still wanna shout out in corrupt voice: Follow the chairman!

li.label: be passionate to life
li.description: Open our mind. Life should be full of happiness.

li.label: daily life of Yandere
li.description: Why do we have to quarrel? Distant heart? Just dig the heart and get closer to each other. Love doesn't mind tiny flaw.

li.label: daily life of Yandere
li.description: Both the bad guys and love rats must be shredded. Love is the most beautiful when covered with blood. I am excited with next slaughtering spree!

li.label: Yandere in minor pain
li.description: Hi! Kill you.

li.label: Yandere in serious pain
li.description: Instead of confessing to the past, it's better to go forward and smash the obstacles in front of you!

li.label: Yandere in intense pain
li.description: Die! F*ck off! Go to hell!

li.label: Yandere in mind-shattering pain
li.description: Lose love? Just kill! That can be together! Hahaha!

li.label: daily life of Genkisa
li.description: Welcome a new day! Let's work hard together!

li.label: daily life of Tsundere
li.description: Huh?! You don't know? How can you stand here cheeky? Tut, tut, pitiful look…OK, I'll demonstrate it again. Remember it!

li.label: daily life of Tsundere
li.description: So what? I won't be happy even if be praised,hum!

li.label: Tsundere has ranged weapon
li.description: Stupid! Shut up! Turn down! Unbelievable! You actually lost to the newfish...Well, I will help you, although it makes me consume huge.

li.label: Tsundere has incendiary weapon
li.description: Huh?! More fuel and torches in my hands? Why do I have to judge with the damn single? First of all, it doesn't mean I like to do it.

li.label: Tsundere horrified
li.description: Wow! Take this scary thing off me!

li.label: Tsundere frustrated
li.description: This time, what? I'm tired of lies, and don't believe it's good for me.

li.label: Tsundere pleased
li.description: Also, what did you do to my body? Well... actually, I don’t really want it…I have to accept it if forced.

li.label: Tsundere quite pleased
li.description: What? Easy to use? I didn't say it. Just go, don't waste my time.

li.label: Tsundere delighted
li.description: Artificial part expert? of course! Who do you think I am? But I feel that there is a conspiracy. So, don't install anything in my body again. Hear it?

li.label: Tsundere disgusted
li.description: You’ve gone too far! I Loathe You!

li.label: jealous of {0}'s bedroom
li.description: Huh?! Why other's bedroom is better than mine? Since you apologize, I will barely make up for two or three days. But I'm still angry!

li.label: proper bedroom
li.description: In fact, I don't care about the quality of the room…

li.label: daily life of Harakuro
li.description: …Uhm…Peace as always, is there anything pleasing?

li.label: daily life of Harakuro
li.description: Oops, today is just a fluke. You may surpass me next time. Efforts will definitely pay off, heh heh!

li.label: Harakuro squeamish
li.description: Wow! It looks very expensive. Is it really okay to give me?

li.label: Harakuro pleased
li.description: It seems that everyone is already good enough.Thanks. I will make good use of it.

li.label: Harakuro enchanted
li.description: It seems to be very interesting. What to do next... Ah, yes, hee hee...

li.label: jealous of {0}'s bedroom
li.description: How beautiful is the room you assigned to me! Everyone is a good and friendly person, isn't it? heh heh... Excuse me.

li.label: daily life of Dokuzetu
li.description: Everyone helps each other, success and happiness together, It's just an ideal. Here, in the rimworld, if someone succeeds in holding hands, someone must be rejected. If someone becomes the core of the leader, someone must become a canned sofa or a dung.

li.label: daily life of Dokuzetu
li.description: Bent on your work. If you only breathe, the horseshoes pin nail is much more useful than you.

li.label: the passing away of love
li.description: It's me. I'm first. I was first...But, why this happens...

li.label: praise the sun
li.description: I hope that one day I will be able to be trusted and dependent, just like the dazzling knight.

li.label: praise the chairman
li.description: That is the only lighthouse in the wilderness, the light of civilization!

li.label: praise the sun
li.description: The sun is a wondrous body. Like a magnificent father! If only I could be so grossly incandescent!

li.label: believer in minor pain
li.description: Ah, the choice is mine.

li.label: believer in serious pain
li.description: Don't worry. Hah hah hah!

li.label: believer in intense pain
li.description: How could a Warrior of the Sun easily kneel down! Hrgraaah!

li.label: believer in mind-shattering pain
li.description: ...My sun, my dear, dear sun...

li.label: ranged reaper in minor pain
li.description: Is the pain of death starting from here? interesting!

li.label: ranged reaper in serious pain
li.description: Trembling, mortal! Remember the name of death!

li.label: ranged reaper in intense pain
li.description: Hah hah hah!

li.label: ranged reaper in mind-shattering pain
li.description: Gah hah hah hah hah hah hah hah hah!

li.label: born leader has ranged weapon
li.description: Let's start!

li.label: life perpetual motion
li.description: Life is a race to encounter and solve problems, isn't it? So let's create our own miracle together.

li.label: born leader in minor pain
li.description: Hold on.

li.label: born leader in serious pain
li.description: But that is not the reason for retreating.

li.label: born leader in intense pain
li.description: Square our shoulders and make our own history!

li.label: born leader in mind-shattering pain
li.description: Don't giv up..the dream...

li.label: keep the body pure
li.description: Respect the body. Don't lose yourself in the enthusiasm for technology.

li.label: deadly temptation
li.description: What a friendly person! Except for those weird topics.

li.label: purification of the soul
li.description: Inner peace…

li.label: energetic
li.description: I feel energetic!

li.label: awkward
li.description: That's really a trouble…

li.label: feel helpless
li.description: What a good person. The only drawback is not being frank.

li.label: admiration and jealousy
li.description: What a perfect person!

li.label: be manipulated
li.description: I was surprised that my friend had such a hobby. Alas...

li.label: be hard hit
li.description: Damn! I have no idea to refute the comment！

li.label: immune to eloquence
li.description: I'm speechless. But it seems that there is no need to refute...

li.label: nostalgia
li.description: The happiness and bitterness will always be treasured in my heart.

li.label: know the brilliance of the Sun
radiance of the sun
li.description: Bringing warmth to others without hesitation, what a noble character！

li.label: timely help
li.description: What a loving person! The road ahead of me is clearer. I have to cheer up!

li.label: like outdoors
li.description: I like being outside.

li.label: dislike indoors
li.description: I don't like working or simply being indoors.

li.label: dislike underground
li.description: I am afraid to work or live in the underground.

li.label: like {0} apparel
li.description: Oh. Is this apparel made for {0}? That's great! I like it!

li.label: owner and victim
li.description: Welcome.

li.label: owner and booty
li.description: Illegal goods? No problem!

li.label: glory belongs to the born warrior
li.description: Glory belongs to the born warrior, A-Fei!

li.label: flat skin
li.description: Hi！You! Flat skin! Drug bust! Open your bag!

li.label: believer in minor pain
li.description: I confess.

li.label: believer in serious pain
li.description: Please forgive me.

li.label: believer in intense pain
li.description: This must be a punishment from heaven.

li.label: believer in mind-shattering pain
li.description: God forgive me, for all my sins.

li.label: faith
li.description: God bless us.

li.label: believer
li.description: Nature is eternal.

li.label: power of faith
li.description: I feel I have the courage to face difficulties again.
